name: Peruvian Namibian (Rhodochrosite & Colbaltoan Smithsonite)
description:
This work is a commentary on the natural resources extracted from mineral-rich countries and the assignment to these inanimate objects of more rights and privileges to cross borders than in some of the minority, marginalized, and vulnerable communities in those countries.

It is also a reflection of the physical traits from different races recognizable and perpetually on display in one being. These racial signifiers, in some cases, reinforce essentialist, either/or thinking and harmful stereotypes, which can at times dictate who does or does not have the access to travel freely around the world.
